name: c2c corner bookmark
notes:
this is the january pattern for my 2023 yearlong bookmark cal. \[click here for more information.\]\[1\]
  
\[i used the mini skeins of yarn from high desert yarn (hand-dye yarn).\]\[2\] shop my affiliate link.
  
the pattern includes a video tutorial, c2c cheatsheet, and written instructions.
